alert.note: Alert for Estill; Powell (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 4:34PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Powell and Estill Counties through 515 PM EDT... At 434 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Wiseman Crossing Station, or near Irvine, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... North Irvine, West Irvine, Spout Springs and Station Camp around 440 PM EDT. Irvine, Ravenna, Hardwick and South Irvine around 445 PM EDT. Willow Tree, Cow Creek, Cottage Furnace, Doe Creek, Vaughns Mill and Wagersville around 450 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Pitts, Fitchburg, Furnace, Knowlton, Pryse, Texola, Shade, Cobhill, Patsey, Pilot, Rogers Chapel, Lombard, See, Natural Bridge S.P., Slade and Nada. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
